name: ContentDiffTest
description: Unit tests for comparing content differences in OpenAPI documents.

test_cases.name: testContentDiffWithOneEmptyMediaType
test_cases.description: Tests the comparison of OpenAPI documents where one has an empty media type, expecting an incompatible result.

test_cases.name: testContentDiffWithEmptyMediaTypes
test_cases.description: Tests the comparison of OpenAPI documents where both have empty media types, expecting an unchanged result.

test_cases.name: testSameContentDiff
test_cases.description: Tests the comparison of the same OpenAPI document, expecting an unchanged result.

test_cases.name: testAddedResponseContentTypeDiff
test_cases.description: Tests the comparison of OpenAPI documents where a response content type is added, expecting a compatible result.

test_cases.name: testRemovedResponseContentTypeDiff
test_cases.description: Tests the comparison of OpenAPI documents where a response content type is removed, expecting an incompatible result.

test_cases.name: testAddedRequestContentTypeDiff
test_cases.description: Tests the comparison of OpenAPI documents where a request content type is added, expecting a compatible result.

test_cases.name: testRemovedRequestContentTypeDiff
test_cases.description: Tests the comparison of OpenAPI documents where a request content type is removed, expecting an incompatible result.
